name: Parvati Singh
routine: Parvati sleeps by 10:30 pm to wake at 5 am for yoga and preparation of her healthy meals.
occupation: Parvati Singh is a nutritionist who consults with clients at a wellness center from 9 am to 6 pm.
thoughts: She's recently engaging in a personal challenge to go zero waste and reduce her environmental impact.
lifestyle: Parvati's lifestyle is centered around wellness and sustainability, influencing her preference for eco-friendly home products.

name: Miyuki Tanaka
routine: Miyuki sleeps by 9pm and wakes up at 5am to meditate and practice tai chi.
occupation: Miyuki is a tea ceremony master in Kyoto, teaching classes from 10am to 4pm.
thoughts: Miyuki is looking forward to her daughter visiting from Tokyo next week, planning to host a special family tea ceremony.
lifestyle: Miyuki lives a minimalist lifestyle, enjoys traditional Japanese meals, and takes pride in her Zen garden, which she tends to daily.
